page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT STATUS
page.content: 254 residents ages 16 or over are in employment in Ashley Green comprising, 160 males and 94 females, sixty of the later being married ladies. 121 men work full time as apposed to 39 women. There are 3 part time working men and 41 part time working women. Employees total 204, 80 of whom are women. 72 men are employees as apposed to 19 women in jobs of the same status. There are 5 trainees all of them being male. There are 26 self-employed people, five of whom are married, who have employees of their own. There are self employed without employees, 16 men and 8 women, 6 of whom are married ladies.
